lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Rodriguez said the Latin and Caribbean nations backed the Reagan Administration's opposition to many of the sections in the legislation, including those to curb imports and to require retaliation for foreign unfair trade practices.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A group of Latin American and Caribbean nations formally opposed trade legislation pending in Congress, saying it would curb their exports, slow development and hinder its ability to repay foreign debt.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He told reporters the committee would likely mount a campaign to fight the legislation when it comes up for debate on the Senate floor, expected next week.
